events.text:
You can use [color=#A5EFAC]A and D[/color] to move left and right.
To jump simply press [color=#A5EFAC]W[/color].
You can also dash by pressing [color=#A5EFAC]SHIFT[/color].
If you're having trouble you can always press [color=#A5EFAC]E[/color] to talk to me again.
Oh, and, if you see any chests, why don't you try hitting them a couple of times?
You might be surprised...
